long_description: The JanSport Odyssey pack is a comfort superstar! It sports a rich array of features that will come in handy when you're commuting across town or hitting the trail. Light, ergonomically shaped shoulder straps conform to your body and help evenly distribute the load. Angled holes in the shoulder straps provide maximum ventilation to keep shoulders cool. Padded hipbelt can be tucked away when not needed. Highly breathable back panel protects your body from the pack's contents and features circulation grooves and recessed channels to increase cooling airflow. Dual main compartments allow you to separate and organize gear; padded sleeve holds a laptop or hydration reservoir (reservoir sold separately). Large front pocket and stash pocket give you choices for optimal organization; V-loft security pocket holds your valuable items. 2 side mesh pockets hold water bottles (not included) or other essentials; daisy chain and ice axe loop let you lash on additional gear. Compression straps allow you to pull the load close to your back for improved balance. The JanSport Odyssey pack is made of durable, 420-denier polyester and 840-denier ballistic nylon.
short_description: The JanSport Odyssey pack is a comfort superstar! It sports a rich array of features that will come in handy when you're commuting across town or hitting the trail.
